articles.title: Assessing Sirius XM After 60% Long Term Slide and Personalised Streaming Expansion
articles.mainIdea: Assessing Sirius XM After 60% Long Term Slide and Personalised Streaming Expansion
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Assessing Sirius XM After 60% Long Term Slide and Personalised Streaming Expansion. If you have ever wondered whether Sirius XM Holdings is quietly turning into a value opportunity or just a value trap, you are in the right place to unpack what the market is really pricing in. Despite a choppy ride, with the stock down 4.0% over the last week, roughly flat over the past month at 0.8%, and still negative year to date at 6.4%, those short term moves sit on top of steep multi year declines of 60.8% over three years and 61.6% over five years. articles.title: Apple (AAPL) Target Raised as Jefferies Sees Stronger iPhone Demand
articles.mainIdea: Apple (AAPL) Target Raised as Jefferies Sees Stronger iPhone Demand
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Apple (AAPL) Target Raised as Jefferies Sees Stronger iPhone Demand. Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is included among the 13 Top Tech Stocks Paying Consistent Dividends. On December 17, Jefferies analyst Edison Lee lifted Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)’s price target to $283.36 from $246.99 while maintaining a Hold rating on the stock. The firm boosted its iPhone shipment forecasts, raising Q1 estimates by 7% and FY26 projections by […] Related tickers mentioned: AAPL, OPAI.PVT.
